events.message: I reported the car accident that occurred yesterday evening at the intersection. The collision caused significant damage to my vehicle.
The insurance claim has been categorized under auto accident following the review of the initial submission and evidence provided.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the procedures and keep you updated throughout the claim process.
Your auto accident claim is officially acknowledged. We have noted all details and will proceed with further steps promptly.
Please provide copies of the police report, vehicle repair estimate, and photos from the accident scene to support your claim.
All requested documents including the police report and repair bills have been submitted to your assigned agent for review.
The investigation of your vehicle accident claim has started, focusing on assessing damage and verifying all submitted materials.
The insurance investigation has been completed. All factors have been evaluated to ensure a fair and accurate claim resolution.
We have formulated a settlement proposal based on the extent of vehicle damage and coverage limits in your policy.
You provided positive feedback on the communication and clarity of the settlement offer, expressing gratitude for the support.
Your auto accident claim has been formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms and conditions.
The agreed settlement payment has been issued to your bank account to cover the repair costs incurred from the accident.
The claim file is now closed after successful payment and confirmation that all issues related to the auto accident are resolved.
